#include <iostream>
#include <cstring>

using namespace std;

int min(int x,int y)
{
	if(x < y)
		return x;
	else
		return y;
}

int main()
{
	int t,i,j,x,total1,total2;
	cin >> t;
	char s1[110],s2[110];
	char c[26];
	int m[26],s[26];
	cin  >> c;
	for(i = 0;i < 26;i++)
	{
		m[i] = c[i] - 97;
	}
	for(i = 0;i < 26;i++)
	{
		s[m[i]] = i;
	} 
	while(t--)
	{
		int a[26] = {0},b[26] = {0};
		total1 = 0;
		total2 = 0;
		cin >> s1;
		cin >> s2;
		for(i = 0;s1[i] != '\0';i++)
			a[s1[i] - 97]++;
		for(i = 0;s2[i] != '\0';i++)
			b[s2[i] - 97]++;
		for(i = 0;i < 26;i++)
		{
			if(a[i] > 0 && b[i] > 0)
			{
				x = min(a[i],b[i]);
				a[i] -= x;
				b[i] -= x;
			}
		}
		for(i = 0;i < 26;i++)
		{
			if(a[i] > 0)
			{
				total1 += s[i];
			}
			if(b[i] > 0)
			{
				total2 += s[i];
			}
		}
		if(total1 > total2)
			cout << "ALICE" << endl;
		else if(total1 < total2)
			cout << "BOB" << endl;
		else
			cout << "TIE" << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
